data.description: An intensive study of stage rigging, scenic locomotion, set construction and structural analysis techniques.
data.title: ADVANCED STAGECRAFT

data.description: Learn how to mount a theatrical production. Through scenery, costumes, lighting, sound, and stage management explore the relationship between the technical components of the production process. Includes lectures as well as practical experience in University Theatre productions.
data.title: TECHNICAL THEATRE FUNDAMENTALS

data.description: Methods and development of techniques used in theatrical drafting.
data.title: DRAFTING FOR THE THEATRE

data.description: Theory and techniques of stagecraft for theatrical production. When taken for 4 credits, a lab component required.
data.title: FUNDAMENTALS OF STAGECRAFT
